medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp/dull periumbilical pain localized to right lower quadrant (RLQ) starting this morning.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning with localized pain in the RLQ. Patient has generalized malaise, nausea (no emesis), anorexia, and diarrhea lasting for the past 3 days. No fever at home but noted 102Â°F in the emergency department. Last episode of diarrhea was this morning.
